verses.name: Ruth 1:4
verses.text: And they took them wives of the women of Moab; the name of the one was Orpah, and the name of the other Ruth: and they dwelled there about ten years.

verses.name: Ruth 1:5
verses.text: And Mahlon and Chilion died also both of them; and the woman was left of her two sons and her husband.

verses.name: Ruth 1:6
verses.text: Then she arose with her daughters in law, that she might return from the country of Moab: for she had heard in the country of Moab how that the Lord had visited his people in giving them bread.
